title: Replica | Norm Typeface
content:
I am interested in buying the Norm typeface Replica from [www.lineto.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150405123258/http:/www.lineto.com/ "www.lineto.com") to use for both display and text.

Does anyone have any experience using this font for display and/or text? I'm more confident about its ability to function as a display font, but if anyone knows anything about using Replica in text, I'd love to know what you thought.
author: Metsa
